about_the_game:
Early adapters are welcomed to Discord. Come join the development process, your feedback will be immensely helpful!


Can't Stand The Heat is an Isometric, restaurant management and simulation game. just don't expect it to be too casual :D

Serve your customers

You are responsible to greet your customers, take their order, cook, serve, collect payment, clean, wash dishes, order inventory, build your menu, set prices and on and on... Sounds exhausting?
IT IS!
.

Pay attention to details

Some details are obvious, bring a menu, take an order... Other are more nuanced, should you bring a fork or a knife, what about napkins? Some things are not told by the customer but will surly make their stay a more positive or negative experience, which will affect their tip and review.
.

Hire employees

Each employee has their personal attributes, happiness and stamina. They take breaks, make mistakes and sometimes don't show up for work. It's up to you to cover for them or find other solutions.
.


Think about ramping up your ingredients so that your dishes won't smell like yesterday's leftovers. Maybe invest in some high grade decor, or those napkins that your customers desperately need, so much to buy, so little cash..

But worry not, your customers will surly appreciate your hard work, leave a glowing review, and tell their friends... right?
Do things right, and with enough cash you can hire some help. A host, waiter, or perhaps a cook?

Wishlist today, and join our Discord to get the latest updates and share your thoughts on the game

name: Can't Stand The Heat
short_description: Congratulations, you own a restaurant! Now just chat with customers, take orders, cook, serve, clean, design your interior and menu, order ingredients...so much to do! Earn enough cash and hire some help to make life easier. Or is it? Try to balance customer needs, employee quirks and your cashflow.
